posts.post_content: awesome piece, wonderful clarity, crystal clear image... umpire behind pitcher. offer please....extremely early baseball image.
Jim- Is that a cdv or a cabinet?  Also, could you post a larger scan?  Thanks.

I am pretty sure its a CDV and I can email u a larger pic...I have a terrible time with my scanner and this site.  I can't upload pic from my phone and my scanners is a few years younger then u so it's old...ha ha. send me your email. It's got a wonderful image and im open for an offer not sure of it's value, but a really neat seen and image. Notice guys running and umpire behind pitcher...not sure of the location either??

**UPLOADED TO EBAY U CAN USE MAGNIFIER** LOW STARTING BID NO RESERVE....SORRY WRONG SECTION I KNOW
A cabinet photograph would be 6.5 x 4.25, a cdv would be 4 x 2.5.  Given the proportion to the pen, I would say it's a cabinet.
